```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(immunarch)
library("devtools")
library("ggplot2")
library("vegan")
library("ineq")
library("tidyverse")
library("praise")
library("scales")
library("patchwork")
```

```{r}
data(immdata) 
repOverlap(immdata$data) %>% vis()      # Compute and visualise the most important statistics:
geneUsage(immdata$data[[1]]) %>% vis()  #     public clonotypes, gene usage, sample diversity
repDiversity(immdata$data) %>% vis(.by = "Status", .meta = immdata$meta)
repExplore(immdata$data, "lens") %>% vis()

```


```{r}

getwd()
file_path = "/Users/teresaattenborough/Decombinator/decombinator/immunarch_vdj/AAF1-a.txt"
immdata <- repLoad(file_path)

exp_len <- repExplore(immdata$data, .method = "len", .col = "aa")
p1 <- vis(exp_len)
p1
```
